description: preparing dhokla mix batter:
firstly, take a bowl and add besan, semolina, hing, turmeric powder, ginger - chilli paste and salt.
and mix well with a help of whisk. now add yogurt, oil, little by little water and mix thoroughly.
make dosa batter consistency
in addition, add 3 tbsp lime juice.
also add baking soda, baking powder and mix thoroughly.
now grease the tray or tiffin box with oil.
then, immediately pour the mixture into the tray.
finally, place it in the steamer and steam for 10-15 mins.
tempering the dhokla:
firstly, heat oil in the pan and add mustard seeds chopped green chillies and curry leaves.
then add sugar, little water, salt and boil it until the sugar dissolves and switch of the flame.
later add lime juice and pour this mixture on the steamed dhokla.
transfer it into a plate and cut into desired pieces.
now garnish with coriander leaves.
finally enjoy it with green chutney and tamarind chutney.
